problem.question: How can you make a quesadilla?
options: Place some cheese on a tortilla, fold it in half and place it in a hot skillet. Cook on each side until cheese is melted.
Place some cheese on a tortilla, fold it in half and place it in a cold skillet. Cook on each side until cheese is melted.

key_steps: Heat is required to melt cheese
Hot skillet provides immediate heat transfer
Cold skillet requires heating time and uneven cooking

constraints.description: Cheese melting requires heat above melting point
Pre-heated surface cooks faster and more evenly

logic_requirements: Explains why hot skillet is necessary
